metadata.synopsis: Murmath (S_UND_DuergarLoyalPatroller_01_a38319cb-c9ed-460a-bba2-1788d1cad20c)  gloats over the dead drow prisoner in a cell.
metadata.how_to_trigger: It triggers right after the palyer finishes the dialog with the nearby spiders (S_UND_DuergarLoyalPatroller_01_Spider_01_82f367a2-14c0-46cf-82d1-f070c87cf95a).

0.speaker: Murmath
0.text: Stinkin' snitch. No one drughs with Clan Flameshade.
0.context: NodeContext: Drugh = drug. aka 'No one fucks with clan Flameshade"
